title: How to find passphrase for Lua maked in cocos game?
content:
I tried to decompile and find 
main.lua
in file (link below) with IDA Pro but it wasn't helpful, because every lua file has it own signature and there is no key near string 
main.lua
. I also tried to find strings such 
xxtea
as I found by search, but there is no string in the file. Screenshot: Link to download file(google drive) But I can't understand how to chain this data to encryption I would be grateful for any advice and further ideas.
